alert.note: Alert for Anson; Montgomery; Richmond; Stanly (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 07 at 5:54PM EDT until August 07 at 6:30PM EDT by NWS Raleigh
info.description: The National Weather Service in Raleigh has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Anson County in central North Carolina... Southwestern Montgomery County in central North Carolina... Western Richmond County in central North Carolina... Southern Stanly County in central North Carolina... * Until 630 PM EDT. * At 554 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Albemarle to near Unionville, moving east at 60 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Wadesboro, Ansonville, Polkton, Norwood, Oakboro, Stanfield, Mount Gilead, Lilesville, Morven and Peachland. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 900 PM EDT for central North Carolina. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 900 PM EDT for central North Carolina.
